com.buession.httpclient.core

接口 RequestBuilder<R extends Request>

  • 类型参数:
    R - Request 具体实现
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractRequestBuilder, ApacheRequestBuilder, OkHttpRequestBuilder

    public interface RequestBuilder<R extends Request>
    请求构建器
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.0
    作者:
    Yong.Teng
